member.name: M:DagAir.Policies.Policies.PoliciesController.GetCurrentRoomPolicy(System.Int64)
member.summary: Returns information about a policy currently in force in a room with a given roomId

member.summary: Create a new policy with parameters specified in addNewRoomPolicyCommand

member.name: M:DagAir.Policies.RoomConditions.ExpectedRoomConditionsController.GetCurrentRoomPolicy(System.Int64)
member.summary: Returns information about a set of expected room conditions with a given expectedRoomConditionsId

member.name: M:DagAir.Policies.RoomConditions.ExpectedRoomConditionsController.CreateNewExpectedRoomConditions(DagAir.Policies.Contracts.Commands.AddNewExpectedRoomConditionsCommand)
